mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMESLOT( start_time, end_time, delivery_date, count, cutoff ) VALUES( #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{delivery_date}, #{count}, #{cutoff} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TIMESLOT SET start_time=#{start_time}, end_time=#{end_time} WHERE timeslot_id=#{timeslot_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TIMESLOT WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN #{init_date} AND #{finish_date} ORDER BY delivery_date ASC, start_time ASC, end_time ASC
